entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: SSW 34 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning near noon then changing to flurries at times heavy early this afternoon and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
